original_text: For the king of the north shall return, and shall set forth a multitude greater than the former, and shall certainly come after certain years with a great army and with much riches.
korean_text: 북방 왕은 돌아가서 다시 군대를 전보다 더 많이 준비하였다가 몇 때 곧 몇 해 후에 대군과 많은 물건을 거느리고 오리라

sentences.original_text: For the king of the north shall return
and shall set forth a multitude greater than the former
and shall certainly come after certain years
sentences.korean_translation: 몇 년 후에 반드시 올 것이며

sentences.original_text: with a great army and with much riches
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 군대와 많은 재물을 가지고 오리라
